com.vectorprint.configuration.annotation

Interface SettingsAnnotationProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SettingsAnnotationProcessorImpl

    public interface SettingsAnnotationProcessor
    Processes objects or classes looking for fields annotated with Setting or SettingsField, when both are present only SettingsField is processed. When the field has no value a value from settings will be required, when none is found you will get a VectorPrintRuntimeException. It is suggested that initSettings will not be executed when it was already called with the same object and the settings.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
    See Also:
    EnhancedMap.getGenericProperty(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Class, java.lang.String...), SettingsField, Setting

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean initSettings(Object o, EnhancedMap settings)
      initializes annotated fields for a class or object.

    • Method Detail

      • initSettings

        boolean initSettings(Object o,
                   EnhancedMap settings)
        initializes annotated fields for a class or object. When the object argument is a Class, only static fields will be initialized, otherwise only instance fields.
        Parameters:
        o - the Class or Object
        settings - the settings to use for initialization
        Returns:
        true when initialization was executed
